effect.description: Anyone who is struck by the sphere or who begins their turn next to it must make a spell power save or take damage and begin Burning. On a success, they take half damage.

Tier_2.name: Columns of Ice
Tier_2.description: As you hold out your palm, an icicle begins to form at its center. Four times, you fire these crystals of ice at spots on the ground within range. They instantly grow into twenty feet high five-by-five foot columns.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an additional action point on this spell to create an additional 2d4 columns

Tier_2.name: Elemental Form
Tier_2.description: As you choose a type of elemental energy, you are wrapped and swaddled by it.

effect.description: In an instant, you are Transformed into the shape of an elemental creature.

Tier_2.name: Grant Elemental Resistance
Tier_2.description: Using mud, ash, water, or snow, you mark an ally's brow with a natural glyph.

effect.description: As you finish, a shroud of natural energy settles around them. For the spell's duration, they are Resistant to an element of your choosing.

Tier_2.name: Wings
Tier_2.description: Eagles' wings unfurl painlessly at your back and immediately you can fly. Your flying speed is equal to twice your normal movement.
Tier_2.upcast: If you spend ten minutes casting this spell, you are able to perform the feat using only a single action point.

Tier_2.name: Magnetic
Tier_2.description: Focus your magic on an object within range to transform it into a powerful magnet. Any metal within the spell's radius is attracted to the magnet. Creatures holding metal weapons must make a spell power save or lose their grip. Creatures wearing metal armor are pulled fifteen feet towards the magnet on failure, or fly to the magnet if they roll below a five, taking 1d6 damage per five feet that they are carried.

components: A magnet or piece of metal

Tier_2.name: Call of the Moon
Tier_2.description: Call upon the power of the moon and transform yourself or an ally into a werewolf.

effect.description: If your target falls to zero health while Transformed, they contract the Lycanthropy condition.

Tier_2.name: Thunderstep
Tier_2.description: Stomp your foot against the ground and focus on a location within range. You disappear with a peel of thunder and a crackling of energy and reappear in an explosion at the point you chose. Anyone within the spell's radius at either the source or destination of your teleportation takes damage.

Tier_2.name: Bilgolf's Massive Ordinance Bear Blast
Tier_2.description: Raise your hand aloft call upon the wisdom of Bilgolf, wizard of the Purple Order. For a moment, there is silence, then a distant roar from overhead. A bear! Streaking towards earth at the speed of sound! With a thunderous explosion, the bear tears through the sound barrier, then plummets atop one of your foes, dealing damage. The bear is unharmed and is protected by a shield of magic energy. As the shield disappates, the bear begins a rampage, fighting for you in the name of Bilgolf.

Tier_2.name: Sticky
Tier_2.description: Knead together a ball of flour, honey, and dragonscale. As you coax its form with your magic, you create an adhesive which cannot be broken. The adhesive does not stick to you so long as you included a hair from your head. The adhesive lasts for the spell's duration and has a cure time of six seconds. Through another casting of this spell, you are able to make a solvent to remove the adhesive.

Tier_2.name: Ward of Hearing and Sight
Tier_2.description: A green stalk bursts out of the ground, a knuckled, hairy appendage ending in a bulbous eye and two overlarge ears. It blinks twice, then vanishes. The eyestalk is tethered to you for one day. Whenever you want, you may focus to see through its eye and hear through its ears. The ward cannot move and has only 1 hit point, but can only be harmed by magic or beings also in the ethereal plane.
Tier_2.upcast: If you spend an additional action point, you may increase the length of the spell to 1 week.

Tier_2.name: Nature's Fury
Tier_2.description: Magic suffuses you as you chew upon a bitter stormheart leaf. As you swallow it's juice, your pupils contract and your muscles begin to writhe. Within moments, you grow to twice your size and gripped by a terrible rage.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, you are Enlarged and Resistant to Physical Damage.

Tier_2.name: Shape Stone
Tier_2.description: As you lay your hand against a stone surface, you magic flows into it and forces it to bend to you. For the spell's duration, you are able to work any stone that you touch as though it was clay. When used for burrowing, this spell allows for a movement speed of one foot per minute. While you can shape stone easily, if you attempt to shape metal, you may be asked to make a check by your Grand Poohbah.

Tier_3.name: Prison of Ice
Tier_3.description: A black wind howls as the air plummets to hundreds of degrees below zero. Your allies watch on, unharmed as all enemies within the spell's radius are bitten by merciless frost.

effect.description: Affected enemies must make a spell power save or take full damage and become Frozen. On success, they take half damage. Frozen enemies are not damaged by the spell until thawed.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns or whenever they are damaged.

Tier_3.name: Awaken
Tier_3.description: Carefully craft a druid's circle with soul gems set at each corner. Place dream-catchers about the ring, and burn incense. Finally, bring a chosen animal into the circle and place your hand on its head. Its eyes glaze over as you reach into its mind and coax forth a spark of the divine. At the end of the ritual, the animal is sentient and gains the ability of human speech.

Tier_3.name: Bountiful Harvest
Tier_3.description: Bring your hands together and make the sign of thanks. As you reach out to your magic, a feast miraculously appears, complete with a table and chairs grown of the finest wood. There is enough food that up to twelve people may partake of the feast. Each of these creatures fully heal, and gain bonus health equal to your level plus your inner fire. This health lasts for 24 hours. Bountiful Harvest may be used at most once per day.

Tier_3.name: Stormlord
Tier_3.description: So great is your connection to the natural world that you may change the weather in a region. Summon forth snow or rain, hail or heat, or any other phenomena you wish. You are able to control the weather to accomplish a specific task. The weather does not change back when concentration is broken.

Tier_3.name: Starfall
Tier_3.description: You raise your hand aloft and reach beyond the sky and up into the realms above. Spend one full round of combat focusing on bringing down four massive meteors. If you are attacked, make a concentration check. On failure, you lose control of the spell, and only 1d4 meteors fall from the sky. On success, call down all four meteors. The fallen stars deal damage to all enemies in their radius. Enemies can be damaged by at most one meteor.

Tier_3.name: Realm Walker
Tier_3.description: Focus on a tree, the earth, or another element of nature. With a sound like a roaring wind, it tears open, revealing a portal to another realm. If you have visited a place, you may open a portal to it. If you have not visited a realm or location, roll a check with your Poohbah to determine where the portal lets out.

Tier_3.name: Perfect Foresight
Tier_3.description: Like a flame cutting through mist, you peer into the future. In the span of a thought, a single event fixes itself in your mind, and you follow all possible permutations. During the spell's duration, change one failed roll to a success or one successful roll to a failure.

Tier_3.name: Ascended State
Tier_3.description: Lifetimes ripple out behind you and merge into one as the knowledge of your ancestors passes over you. Your connection to the world around you heightens as you reach ascension.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, you are able to fly at your normal movement speed. Enemies must make all spell power saves against your magic at disadvantage. Once per turn as a reaction, you are able to move and and make an action out of turn. If you are killed in the ascended state, you cannot be resurrected.

name: Cleric

handbook.title: Intro
handbook.text: Servant of the divine. A cleric has given themselves over to the worship of a deity or deities. For some, this means a life spent at a temple, while for others, it means wandering the realms and preaching the good word. As an adventurer, your deity has chosen you for something special and has granted you the power to carry out their will. Clerics are practitioners of divine magic, and are known for their ability to bring healing to the sick and dying.

handbook.title: When Adventuring
handbook.text: Clerics use divine magic to overcome their problems. When adventuring you may call back the soul of a departed person for questioning, force an enemy's blade to disobey them, or project yourself across the realms to aid a distant ally. Unlike most other classes, the cleric always has someone in their corner. As they reach higher levels, a Cleric's deity or their servants may reach out, giving guidance and providing marching orders.

handbook.title: When Socializing
handbook.text: Clerics are welcome most everywhere, and it is not out of the ordinary for commonfolk to approach them for blessings or healing. Temples can be found scattered throughout the realms, and can serve as a friendly place for practitioners a given faith. Indeed, the only people who generally dislike Clerics are those of competing faiths, or followers of dark gods in opposition to a cleric's deity.

handbook.title: When in Combat
handbook.text: Clerics often take a supporting role in combat, granting powerful boons to their allies and weakening their enemies. Healing magic is at the core of a cleric's arsenal; when a party's barbarian launches themselves headlong into a horde of skeletons, it is often the cleric that keeps them standing long enough to emerge victorious. Clerics are not without the ability to fight, however. With beams of scouring light, they are able to blind their foes and push them back into the darkness.

expertise: As a cleric, you take expertise in intelligence checks. This includes any checks made to perform informal magic.

Tier_1.name: Beam of Light
Tier_1.description: As raise your holy symbol, a blinding beam of radiance streaks towards your target.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point spent on this spell, deal an additional dice of damage.

effect.description: If you roll a 6 on any of the dice for this attack, your target is Blinded until the end of their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Fiery Rebuke
Tier_1.description: White hot flames fill the space around you as you call on your deity for protection. They deal damage to everyone in the spell's radius.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point spent on this spell, increase its radius by 10 feet.

Tier_1.name: Block Attack
Tier_1.description: Your holy symbol blazes and a shimmering barrier materializes between an attack and its target.

effect.description: As a reaction, force an attacking enemy to make a spell power save. On failure, their attack misses. On success, it deals half damage.

Tier_1.name: Ward of Protection
Tier_1.description: Clasp your hands and pray over one of your allies, beseeching your deity to protect them from harm. As you pray, a ward of light shimmers over their heart.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, whenever they are attacked, the ward flares with light, granting them +2 armor.

Tier_1.name: Divine Resonance
Tier_1.description: Radiance envelops you and spreads in waves, shaking your enemies' moral.

effect.description: Foes within the spell's radius must make a spell power save or become Staggered on their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Detect Evil
Tier_1.description: Your deity grants you a view into the hearts of others. For the spell's duration, evil creatures are surrounded by an aura of darkness in your vision, while good creatures with an aura of light. The definition of good and evil corresponds to the deity that you worship.

Tier_1.name: Purification
Tier_1.description: With a gentle touch, you drive impurity from a food, drink, potion, or person. You may use this spell to render poisons innocuous, heal minor status effects such as drunkenness, or to convert water to holy water at a rate of one gallon per hour. Purification can be used on a person to remove a status effect or to render a curse innocuous for one day.

Tier_1.name: Mend
Tier_1.description: Your hands glow as you magically mend small dents, dings, scratches, and tears on an item you are touching.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an action point on this spell to increase it's power, mending larger items such as broken walls, wheels, or armor.

Tier_1.name: Holy Light
Tier_1.description: With a muttered prayer, you raise an object aloft and it illuminates, casting light within the spell's radius.

effect.description: Undead and demonic creatures who begin their turn within the light are Staggered.

Tier_1.name: Make Habitable
Tier_1.description: The road levels itself before you, and all things shift to ease your passing. While you concentrate, you are immune to the effects of difficult terrain. Further, the area within the spell's radius becomes pleasant and habitable. Snow becomes warm to the touch, rain ceases to fall, and puddles instantly evaporate.

Tier_1.name: Prayer of Healing
Tier_1.description: As you channel the power of your deity, your voice resonates with profound compassion. Echoing waves of healing knit your target's wounds shut. If you physically touch your target, double the number of dice rolled.

Tier_1.name: Spare
Tier_1.description: As one of your allies falls, you cry out to aid them. A blinding white light shines about their form, and they are immediately stabilized. They remain unconscious, but no longer need to make Death Coin flips and their health returns to zero.

Tier_1.name: Guardian Blade
Tier_1.description: In a burst of golden sparks, a holy weapon appears to float in the air beside you. The blade is able to make its own reactions, and is capable of making exposed attacks. On your turn, you may move the blade up to thirty feet and attack with it as an action. The blade must remain within one hundred feet of you or be desummoned. For attack and damage roles, use your inner fire as the modifier.

Tier_1.name: Sap Life
Tier_1.description: Dark tendrils writhe from your outstretched hand and pierce your enemy. They pulse like veins as they sap your target's vitality and return it to you.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point, deal an additional dice of damage.

effect.description: Any damage dealt by this spell is Leeched.

Tier_1.name: Delayed Heal
Tier_1.description: In a moment of silence, mark a chosen ally with a delayed healing ward. They may call upon its rejuvenating energies when they need it most, mending their wounds at an opportune moment. They may trigger the ward as a reaction or free action.

Tier_1.name: Compelled Truth
Tier_1.description: Your eyes flash as you apply divine pressure to your target.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or become incapable of lying.
effect.save: The spell's victim may re-attempt their save once per hour.

Tier_1.name: Enlarge
Tier_1.description: As you grasp your holy symbol, glowing energy suffuses a creature of your choosing.

effect.description: At once, their body Enlarged. You may choose to cast this spell using concentration.
effect.save: Unwilling targets may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns or once every five minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Forget Ability
Tier_1.description: With the aid of your deity, attempt to drive a spike into an enemy's mind.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or lose an ability of your choice. For example, a dragon may forget how to breathe fire.
effect.save: The spell's victim may repeat their save at the end of each turn or once every ten minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Hold Weapon
Tier_1.description: As someone attempts to do violence, you hold up your hand and command the hostile intent to leave their weapon.

effect.description: Your target must make a spell power saving throw or have their weapon be rendered inert.

Tier_1.name: Share Sense
Tier_1.description: As your fingertips make contact, a sacred connection forms, allowing you to borrow the senses of another. For the spell's duration, you are able to meditate to share in another's experiences.

Tier_1.name: Slow
Tier_1.description: As you touch your magic, your next word comes slowly as though stretched over time. Like honey, it drips over your target.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Slowed by the soothing cadence of your speech.
effect.save: The spell's victim may repeat its save at the end of each of its turns or once every five minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Identify
Tier_1.description: Take ten minutes to carefully inspect an item, object, or spell and learn its nature. In most cases, this will allow you to glean everything magical about the object. However, for some very complex spells or for spells that have been crafted specifically to avoid detection, the Grand Poohbah may call for an intelligence check.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend one action point on this spell to reduce the casting time to instantaneous.

Tier_1.name: Blind
Tier_1.description: Holy symbol in hand, you attempt to rob an enemy of their sight.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or their eyes cloud over as they become Blinded.
effect.save: The spell's victim may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns or once every five minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Haste
Tier_1.description: Your voice rises in a quickening tempo as you urge your target forward.

effect.description: Blood pounds in their ears as they are filled with incredible energy. For the spell's duration, they are affected by the Hastened condition.

Tier_1.name: Message
Tier_1.description: Hold an object which belongs to someone you've met. You are able to telepathically send them a message of up to 25 words, regardless of distance. The creature then has sixty seconds to respond to you, also with 25 words.

components: An item that belonged to your target

Tier_1.name: Feign Death
Tier_1.description: Touch up to five willing individuals to cause them to fall into a state indistinguishable from death. Their bodies' go cold and grey, and wounds open on their skin under your direction. For the duration, they view themselves from above as though disembodied. Whenever you will it, they return to their bodies, good as new.

Tier_1.name: Bind
Tier_1.description: Focus your intent upon an encroaching enemy and lift your hand to stop them.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point spent on this spell, you may attempt to bind five more creatures.

effect.description: The creature must make a spell power saving throw or be Incapacitated and frozen in place.
effect.save: They may repeat their saving throw at the end of each of their turns. The effect is immediately ended if the creature is harmed.

Tier_2.name: Leap of Faith
Tier_2.description: Look skyward and put your faith in your diety. As you step out onto a surface that will not hold you, it is instead solid and safe. In this way you can walk atop water, molten earth, or even across thin air. This spell continues until you lose concentration or until you have moved 300 feet.

Tier_2.name: Excoriating Beam
Tier_2.description: A blinding beam of light streaks from you, ringed with halos. The blast harms everyone in a line before you, but is stopped by inanimate objects with a width greater than one foot.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an additional action point on this spell to allow it to pass through obejcts with a width up to five feet.

effect.description: Anyone struck by the spell must make a spell power save or be Blinded until the end of their next turn.

Tier_2.name: Dispel Magic
Tier_2.description: Carefully undo the weave of a first tier spell or curse. If the magic that you seek to reverse is of a higher tier, a check must be made as defined by the Grand Poohbah. Dispel magic does not heal damage or repair magically damaged objects.

Tier_2.name: Speak Tongues
Tier_2.description: Your deity touches your tongue and allows you to communicate its word to others. You are able to speak and understand any language for the spell's duration.

Tier_2.name: Mass Heal
Tier_2.description: Hands clasped, you pray for the health of all those around you. Glowing golden light wraps any allies within the spell's radius as they are healed.

Tier_2.name: Hallow
Tier_2.description: Take a few minutes to cast a prayer of healing upon your campsite. For the spell's duration, any sleep taken within the radius passes as though it was in a bed. Further, perception checks made within the radius are at advantage.

Tier_2.name: Speak with the Dead
Tier_2.description: Anoint a body with holy oil and clutch a candle close. As you reach out to your diety, the candle flares as the deceased's spirit returns to the mortal coil. The corpse cannot move, but is able to speak so long as it's mouth and ears are present. You may ask it three questions before the spell ends and the flame goes out. This spell may be cast on a given creature exactly once.

components: 1 gold piece worth of holy oil

Tier_2.upcast: You can spend an additional action point to ask five questions of the corpse.

Tier_2.name: Death Ward
Tier_2.description: Mix together sacred ash and holy water, then place a small gemstone within. As you begin a prayer, the gemstone shatters and the mixture shimmers with golden light. Use the ash to trace a holy glyph on the brow of an ally. The next attack that would have dropped them to zero health is negated.

components: A gem worth ten gold pieces

Tier_2.name: Scry
Tier_2.description: Press a focusing gem against a reflective surface and speak the primordial word for 'reveal.' The gem instantly merges with the surface, leaving it iridescent. You are able to view a person or place that you know as if through a one way window. The scry spell cannot penetrate lead or certain protective spells. By default, sound is not conveyed. However, you can optionally let a person know that you are scrying them. If they are a mage, they are able to spend one action point to tether your scrying spell to a nearby reflective object, allowing you to communicate with one another.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to allow sound to transfer through the spell even if the recipient doesn't know you are watching them.

Tier_2.name: Town Portal
Tier_2.description: When you enter a town, you may pray over a dwelling and draw a holy glyph on the doorframe. From that point forward, you may perform a ritual to open a door to that location, regardless of distance. You may mark at most one building per town in this way.

Tier_2.name: Truesight
Tier_2.description: Your eyes shimmer with holy light as you speak a prayer for clarity.

effect.description: By the power of your deity, grant yourself and up to six others Trusight.

Tier_2.name: Silence
Tier_2.description: Holding your magic, you speak the celestial word for 'Silence.' At once, the world mutes itself as though you are underwater. No sound may be produced within the spell's radius.

effect.description: Enemies within the spell's radius are considered Muted.

Tier_2.name: Guardians of Faith
Tier_2.description: Holy spirits fill the space around you in a swirling tide of light.

effect.description: Enemies within the spell's radius are Hindered. When they move into the spell's radius or begin their turn within it, they must make a spell power save or take damage. On success, they take half damage.

Tier_2.name: Banish Undead
Tier_2.description: Hold your focus aloft as a bane for undead enemies.

components: Holy Water, Oil, or a Holy Symbol

effect.description: Any undead enemy within the spell's radius must make a spell power save or be Frightened of you.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save at the end of each turn or once every ten minutes when out of combat.

Tier_2.name: Commune
Tier_2.description: Attempt to commune with your patron. Roll 1d20 and add your expertise. On a 19 or above, you make contact. During this contact, you may ask one question, which your patron may choose to answer or not. Commune can be attempted once per day.

Tier_2.name: Remove Curse
Tier_2.description: Sit beside a creature that you believe has a curse. Wash them with holy water and purify their wounds with salt. Lay a piece of untarnished silver over their heart and call upon your diety. For most curses and status effects, this ritual will remove them and also restore full health to your target. For some powerful curses, you may be forced to make a check by the Grand Poohbah. If a fiend placed the curse, they may appear to try to reclaim their prize.

Tier_2.name: Sphere of Encasement
Tier_2.description: Hold a piece of quarts to your eye and view a creature through it. At once, an orb of unbreakable magical energy forms around them. Nothing may pass through the orb, though it always has enough oxygen for the creature within. The creature inside can push the orb to cause it to rotate, moving a distance up to half its movement on its turn.

Tier_3.name: Resurrection
Tier_3.description: Lay out the body of someone who has died within the past week. Spend time anointing them with oil, burning incense, and using your magic to mend their body. Lay a soul gem on their chest and ask your deity for their strength. Roll 1d20. If the result is 11 or higher, reclaim the target's soul and return them to life. On failure, they may not be resurrected.
Tier_3.upcast: If someone who loved the deceased dearly helps you, they may spend one action point to to grant you advantage on your check.

Tier_3.name: Saint's Blessing
Tier_3.description: Mark an ally with holy oil and grant them your blessing.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, they considered Immune. When the spell ends, any pre-existing status effects or curses return.

Tier_3.name: Holy Weapons
Tier_3.description: Holy fire spirals from the sky and alights upon your allies' weapons. For the spell's duration, allies who deal martial damage within the spell's radius set their target aflame.

effect.description: Affected enemies begin Burning.

Tier_3.name: Pillar of Dawn
Tier_3.description: Spread your hands wide as you summon forth the glory of your deity. A pillar of fire falls from the heavens and envelops a radius of your choosing. The fire crackles and spreads, reducing your target to cinders.

effect.description: Anyone struck by the beam is instantly set ablaze and begins Burning. They must also make a spell power save or be rendered Blind.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save at the end of each turn.

Tier_3.name: Avatar
Tier_3.description: Close your eyes and empty your mind. By the will of your diety, project your conciousness across the void. A faintly glowing copy of you appears somewhere in the Realms at a location of your choosing. You control the copy as though it is you. The copy has full health and action points, and knows your abilities. It persists until your real body loses concentration on it, or until it falls to zero health and disappears.

Tier_3.name: Mantle of Dawn
Tier_3.description: A halo blazes about your head, shedding radiant light in a radius around you.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, all allies within the radius are Empowered and enemies are Diminished.

name: Wizard

handbook.title: Intro
handbook.text: Students of the arcane, wizards are practitioners of world-bending magics. Advanced wizards can take flight, smite their foes with balls of fire, and bend time to their whim. Even fledgling wizards can bring mundane objects to life, send messages to distant allies, and fill their foes mouths’ with slithering slugs. These advanced magics come at a price -- wizards must study diligently to gain their power, standing on the shoulders of giants as they strive to become legends in their own right.

handbook.title: When Adventuring
handbook.text: A wizard's arsenal of spells is of great use when adventuring. The ability to summon objects, shrink or grow objects, and teleport are of immense value to any adventuring party. With their great intelligence, wizards are also of use whenever questions of history, geography, or intuition are encountered.

handbook.title: When Socializing
handbook.text: Some wizards are scatterbrained, others stoic, and some are merely excited to see the world. While a wizard might have trouble being the party’s face when dealing with common folk, they can be of enormous value whenever speaking with the intelligentsia of a region.

handbook.title: When in Combat
handbook.text: A wizard’s spells can shape the face of combat, taking powerful enemies out of play through a combination of serious damage and status effects. However, wizards are notorious for their frail forms and low health. As such, wizards must boost their defense with magic, or hide behind their more resilient allies.

expertise: As a Wizard, you are marked by your raw intellect. Take expertise in all intelligence checks, including checks made to cast informal magic. Further, take expertise in history checks made to uncover lore about a location or item.

Tier_1.name: Firecrackers
Tier_1.description: Clutching a spent peice of charcoal, you mutter the language of flame and focus on a point within range. At once, a sizzling bead of light appears and begins to hiss and pop like a tinker's firecrackers.

effect.description: Enemies within the spell's radius must make a spell power save or be Distracted until the end of their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Summoning Spell
Tier_1.description: Fix a familiar object in your mind and call to it. The object lifts into the air and flies towards you, born by the invisible streams of magic that flow throughout the realms. The object knows enough to avoid any barriers, but mindlessly takes the quickest path to you. The object must be something that you have seen before, and cannot be more than 10 pounds in weight. If the object is restrained or protected by magical means, this spell may fail, or the Poohbah may ask you to make a check.

Tier_1.name: Candlelight
Tier_1.description: Roll a piece of string between your fingers and channel your magic into it. It magically ignites, but is not burned. As you release it, the flickering light hovers at your side. The light is difficult to snuff and obeys your subconcious commands, moving as you instruct it within a radius centered on you. If it leaves the radius, it continues to hover, but cannot obey you. The candle gives off light within a thirty foot radius.

components: A piece of string or wick

Tier_1.name: Unseen Hand
Tier_1.description: Mutter a spell to will an ethereal hand into existence. While you concentrate on it, the hand acts as an extension of your will. The hand has a flying speed of 25 feet and may not leave the spell's radius. Its strength score is equivalent to your inner fire modifier.

Tier_1.name: Conjure Illusion
Tier_1.description: Throw a piece of glass into the air and call upon your magic. The glass shatters into a cloud of shimmering dust and instantly flies to an area of your choice. It forms an illusory image of the size of a person or smaller. To all those who see the illusion, it appears to be present, though upon further inspection, it is ethereal. When you release concentration, the illusion persists for one minute unless you choose otherwise.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an additional action point on this spell to program the illusion to move and to react to certain triggers. You may define up to five triggers and the action that the illusion will take should they occur. An illusory guard might say 'good day' to anyone who approaches. Your illusion cannot think or act on its own, and your triggers and actions must be able to be described in a handful of words. Additionally, you may spend an action point to increase theh size of the illusion to that of a merchant's stall or smaller.

Tier_1.name: Detect Magic
Tier_1.description: As you blink your eyes, the flows of magic become visible to you. While you are in this state, sources of magic appear to glow, and you may make perception checks to detect neaby magic.

Tier_1.name: Arcane Armor
Tier_1.description: Grip a lump of iron in your hand. As you grasp your magic, the iron glows and is consumed. Glowing plate made of arcane energy covers you or an ally within range, granting protection from harm.

effect.description: The recipient's evasiveness is increased by an amount equal to your inner fire for the spell's duration.

Tier_1.name: Eat Slugs
Tier_1.description: Fixing your eyes on your target, you crush a slug, worm, or caterpillar between your fingers.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or have their mouth filled with fat, slithering slugs and be Staggered until the end of their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Flare
Tier_1.description: You smear a streak of phosphorus upon a pebble and hold your hand aloft. A mote of scorching flame crackles toward a target of your choosing. The flare burns as brightly as daylight and leaves a lingering trail behind it.

effect.description: Your target becomes Vulnerable until the end of their next turn. If you roll a 6 on any of the dice for this attack, your target begins Burning.

Tier_1.name: Arcane Blow
Tier_1.description: With a sound like a thunderclap, you punch your foe with a fist instilled with arcane power. If they are one size larger than you or smaller, they must make a spell power save or be knocked back fifteen feet.

Tier_1.name: Drain
Tier_1.description: Shadowy tendrils claw at your target. Necrotic energy tears at your enemy, breaking down their essence and transferring it to you.

effect.description: If you roll a 4 on any dice for this attack, regain one action point.

Tier_1.name: Acrid Mist
Tier_1.description: A billowing cloud of stinking green gas fills an area of your choosing. It lingers there for the spell's duration, burning the lungs of anyone who breathes it.

effect.description: Enemies who pass through or begin their turn within the fumes must make a spell power save or be damaged and Staggered. On a successful save, they take half damage.

Tier_1.name: Jet of Frost
Tier_1.description: Frigid air howls from your focus, biting at the enemies in a cone before you.

effect.description: Targets must make a spell power save or begin to freeze under the icy blast and be Slowed until the end of their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Pindigae's Arcane Orbs
Tier_1.description: Two multicolored orbs of crackling energy swirl about you before streaking towards as many targets. Make one attack per orb. The orbs do not need to target a single creature.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point spent on this spell, fire an additional orb.

Tier_1.name: Become Slime
Tier_1.description: Channel your magic into a bit of tallow or other fat and eat it.

effect.description: As you chew, your body melts and oozes and you Transform into a slime.

Tier_1.name: Bubble of Air
Tier_1.description: Knead a bit of soap between your fingers and blow upon it.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to create six additional bubbles of air.

effect.description: A shimmering bubble of breathable air appears around your target's head, sustaining them for up to one hour.

Tier_1.name: Mirror Image
Tier_1.description: Glance into a reflective substance and wield your magic. Summon a number of false images of yourself equal to your spell power at any location you can see in the reflection. These mirror images copy your actions exactly, but are incapable of interacting with the world in any way. Each has a single hit point.

effect.description: On any turn in which an enemy wants to attack you, they must make an spell power save or become Fixated on one of your images for a brief moment and attack it instead.

Tier_1.name: Animate Weapon
Tier_1.description: Cause a one-handed weapon to float a few feet from you. The weapon has its own reaction which it can use to make exposed attacks. On your turn you may move the weapon up to thirty feet and may attack with it as an action. If the weapon leaves the spell's radius, you may no longer command it, but it remains hovering until the spell ends. Use your inner fire for any checks or attacks made by the weapon.

Tier_1.name: Mage Charge
Tier_1.description: Magic crackles around you as you burst forward with incredible speed, traveling the spell's range in a heartbeat. Roll an attack against each enemy struck by your passing. You are not considered exposed while moving using this spell.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point spent on this spell, travel 15 feet further and do 1d4 additional damage.

effect.description: Any enemy struck by you must make a spell power save or be knocked Prone.

Tier_1.name: Jelly Arms
Tier_1.description: Weave a spell and hold a needle aloft. A thousand arcane pins appear around your target, then suddenly lance them.

components: A pin, needle, or other small, sharp implement

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or their limbs go slack and fail them, rendering them Staggered and Vulnerable until the end of their next turn.

Tier_1.name: Bagabone's Nightcap
Tier_1.description: In a burst of rainbow sparks, a faintly glowing and incredibly cozy nightcap appears on the head of your target.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or fall into an incredibly deep and restful sleep, rendering them Incapacitated.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns or once every hour when out of combat. They instantly succeed if they are injured.

Tier_1.name: Featherfall
Tier_1.description: With a flourish, you produce a feather seemingly from nowhere. It ignites, and in that moment, you may focus your magic on an creature or object to slow its falling speed to that of a feather.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to use this spell on up to five additonal objects or creatures.

Tier_1.name: Message
Tier_1.description: Hold an object which belongs to someone you've met. You are able to telepathically send them a message of up to 25 words, regardless of distance. The creature then has sixty seconds to respond to you, also with 25 words.

components: An item that belonged to your target

Tier_1.name: Archibold's Arcane Automaton
Tier_1.description: Using items nearby, summon an arcane construct. You may command at most two such constructs at a time. You may give your constructs simple commands and they will follow them without deviating regardless of distance.

components: Fifty pounds of scrap material, rocks, or other items which will be assembled to create the automaton.

Tier_1.name: Become Ethereal
Tier_1.description: Your form flickers as you enter the plane of the ethereal. You may stay there for a number of minutes equal to your combined spell power and expertise or until you choose to regain your material form as a free action.

effect.description: While in this state, you are considered Ethereal.

Tier_1.name: Grow or Shrink
Tier_1.description: Crush a mushroom in your hand as you say an arcane incantation.

effect.description: Your target's body bubbles and writes as they are Enlarged or Shrunk. Unwilling creatures may make a spell power save to avoid the effect.
effect.save: Affected creatures may repeat their saving throw at the end of each of their turns or once every ten minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Identify
Tier_1.description: Take ten minutes to carefully inspect an item, object, or spell and learn its nature. In most cases, this will allow you to glean everything magical about the object. However, for some very complex spells or for spells that have been crafted specifically to avoid detection, the Grand Poohbah may call for an intelligence check.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend one action point on this spell to reduce the casting time to instantaneous.

Tier_2.name: Statue
Tier_2.description: With a crackle, your target's skin begins to harden.

effect.description: Unwilling creatures must make a spell power save or become stone and be considered Frozen.
effect.save: Affected creatures can re-attempt their saving throw at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_2.name: Door Step
Tier_2.description: As you place your hand on a door-handle or walk through an archway, magic flows through you, opening a portal to another door within range.

Tier_2.name: Invisibility
Tier_2.description: Over the span of a second, you target's skin, then organs, then bones disappear.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, they are Invisible.

Tier_2.name: Scry
Tier_2.description: Press a focusing gem against a reflective surface and speak the primordial word for 'reveal.' The gem instantly merges with the surface, leaving it iridescent. You are able to view a person or place that you know as if through a one way window. The scry spell cannot penetrate lead or certain protective spells. By default, sound is not conveyed. However, you can optionally let a person know that you are scrying them. If they are a mage, they are able to spend one action point to tether your scrying spell to a nearby reflective object, allowing you to communicate with one another.

Tier_2.name: Platform
Tier_2.description: With a twist of your hand, a circular disk of purple light appears at a point of your choosing. The disk is one foot thick and is formed of solid magic. It is capable of holding any amount of weight.

Tier_2.name: Dispel Magic
Tier_2.description: Carefully undo the weave of a first tier spell or curse. If the magic that you seek to reverse is of a higher tier, a check must be made as defined by the Grand Poohbah. Dispel magic does not heal damage or repair magically damaged objects.

Tier_2.name: Ice Spear
Tier_2.description: As you hold your focus aloft, a four foot spear of crystalline ice materializes, then hurtles towards your target.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an additional action point on this spell to add 2d6 damage.

Tier_2.name: Fireball
Tier_2.description: Darkness, blacker than black, darker than dark! Channel your magic into a dried ball of bat guano and sulfur to turn it into a bead of sizzling light. It streaks towards your target before erupting into a massive fireball.

effect.description: Enemies caught in the blast must make a spell power save or begin Burning.

Tier_2.name: Octahedral Barrier
Tier_2.description: In a rush of energy, a pyramid of solid magic forms around you and serves as a barrier.

effect.description: It protects you and any allies in close proximity from an incoming ranged or magical attack.

Tier_2.name: Cage
Tier_2.description: Bars of energy lance towards the sky in a radius around you, visible only to those on the inside. Anyone may enter the spell's radius, but none may leave until it ends.

Tier_2.name: Pocket Dimension
Tier_2.description: Use a key to open a small portal to your own, private pocket dimension. The dimension is a 5ft cube which persists over time, allowing you to store objects within it. In a given day, the pocket dimension holds enough oxygen to sustain one average sized creature for one hour.

Tier_2.name: Clone
Tier_2.description: You have recovered the ancient secret of creating simulacra. Spend a day infusing a mound of clay with rare herbs and minerals, then use your magic to shape it into a humanoid form. Place a soul gem at its center, then have a willing creature or yourself lay beside it and cast your magic. The creature of clay becomes a living, breathing copy of the spell's target. It has intelligence and their memories, but is aware that it is a copy and is friendly to you. The clone has the same stats and abilities as the original, but has half of the original's hit point maximum and is incapable of casting spells higher than tier one or of restoring health or action points via rest. The copy does not age or grow more powerful and cannot increase in level or learn new abilities. If it is damaged, you may use clay and rare herbs and minerals to heal it, valued at ten gold per hit point restored. If the clone reaches zero hit points, it is reduced to dust. You may command at most two such clones at any given time.

components: A soul gem valued at 1000 gold pieces
Rare herbs and minerals valued at 500 gold pieces

Tier_2.name: Polymorph
Tier_2.description: Your target's body begins to warp as they seamlessly transition into the form of a non-villain creature of their tier or lower.
Tier_2.upcast: Spend one additional action point on the spell to increase its save to once per week.

effect.description: Unwilling targets may attempt a spell power save to avoid being Transformed. You are able to end the effects of a casting of Polymorph at any time as an action.
effect.save: The spell's victim may repeat their save once per day. If you cast this spell on yourself, it may be cast as an Offhand Action.

Tier_2.name: Chain Lightning
Tier_2.description: Loose a bolt of crackling lighting which streaks towards your foe. Thunder peels over and over as your magic leaps from target to target. After the lightning hits your first target, roll 1d4. If the roll is greater than 1, the lightning chains to another enemy of your choice. Continue until you roll a 1. Lightning may only strike the same creature twice and may leap a maximum of ten times.

Tier_2.name: Rainbows
Tier_2.description: With the sound of trumpets, a blinding beam of light flares from your fingertips or mouth. As the light moves further from you, it separates into bands of color; a rainbow! The beam passes through enemies in a line before it.

effect.description: Anyone struck by the beam must make a spell power save or begin vomiting rainbows, rendering them Vulnerable and Staggered.
effect.save: The spell's victims may reattempt their save at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_2.name: Igna Bokak
Tier_2.description: Clutching the feather of a phoenix in your hands, you scream the ancient words: IGNA, BOKAK! At once, the feather bursts into flame and a blazing Firebird appears above your head and streaks towards an enemy of your choosing. The creature leaves a path of fire in its wake, and anyone who walks through it takes 2d6 damage. The bird then attacks your foe each turn for three turns.

Tier_2.name: M&M's Beckoning Call
Tier_2.description: Lay your hands on a willing creature and imbue them with magic of recall. One time over the spell's duration, you are able to instantly teleport them to a space adjacent to you, regardless of distance. This teleportation has the same restrictions as any other, may be blocked by certain spells or abilities, and is performed as a Free Action.

Tier_3.name: Gate
Tier_3.description: Energy hums as you tear a rift in reality and create a gate to another place. The gate stands ten feet tall and twenty feet wide. You may target a specific location that you have visited as the other side of the gate, or else make an intelligence check to target somewhere you have not been. The target may be another of the Realms.

Tier_3.name: Fly
Tier_3.description: The weave of magic supports and guides you, and gravity fades away. For the spell's duration, your target can fly. Their flying speed is equal to twice their normal walking speed.
Tier_3.upcast: For each additional action point spent, grant four more creatures the power of flight.

Tier_3.name: Invulnerability
Tier_3.description: Magic suffuses your target, and their skin becomes hard as diamond even as all magics are repelled from them.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, they are considered Invincible.

Tier_3.name: Tri-beam
Tier_3.description: A pulse of energy fills the air around you as you tear the fabric of reality and touch the realm of chaos. Hair stands on end, and a chill runs down the spine of everyone present. Pointing at your targets, you loose three beams of raw magic.

effect.description: Roll an attack for each beam, then roll 1d6.
options: On a 1, the beam is a ray of weakness and the creature must make a spell power save or be rendered Weakened and Vulnerable.
On a 2, the beam is a ray of fire which deals damage. Your target must make a spell power save or begin Burning.
On a 3, the beam is a ray of frost which deals damage. Your target must make a spell power save or Slowed.
On a 4, the beam is a ray of disruption. Your target must make a spell power save or be Dumbstruck.
On a 5, the beam is a ray of electricity which deals damage. Your target must make a spell power save or be Stunned.
On a 6, the beam is a ray of death, and the affected creature takes an additional 4d6 damage.

Tier_3.name: Stop Time
Tier_3.description: As you spin a timepiece in your hand, focus your magic on it and speak the forgotten tongue of the Timekeepers. In a radius around you, time slows to a crawl.

components: A stopwatch, hourglass, or other time-telling implement

Tier_3.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to increase the spell's radius to 300 feet.

effect.description: Everyone within the spell's radius must make a spell power save or be frozen in time for the spell's duration and Incapacitated. Anyone or anything that is touched or attacked is instantly returned to the normal flow of time.
effect.save: Effected creatures can remake their save at the end of each of your turns or once every five minutes when out of combat.

Tier_3.name: Anti-Magic Ring
Tier_3.description: With the weight of purpose, begin an arcane enchantment which nullifies nearby magic. This including spells, magical items, and potions. For as long as you concentrate on the spell, no magic may be performed or partaken of within its radius.

effect.description: Magically sustained or animated creatures within the spell are considered Vulnerable.

Tier_3.name: Black Hole
Tier_3.description: There is a moment of silence as a black speck, smaller than a gnome's fingernail, appears, hanging at a point of your choosing. Then, there is a scream of air as all inanimate objects within the spell's radius are pulled 25 feet towards the newly summoned black hole. The black hole instantly swells to the size of a halfling as debris reaches it.

effect.description: Each turn, everyone within the spell's radius must make a spell power save or be pulled 1d6 x 5 feet towards the black hole. All creatures that begin their turn within 50 feet of the black hole are Slowed when they are first affected, and Hindered thereafter. Anyone who touches the black hole takes the spell's damage.

Tier_3.name: Reverse Gravity
Tier_3.description: Mutter a spell as you press two magnets together. Dust and debris start flying towards the sky as the fabric of reality warps and gravity is reversed in a radius around you. You may end the spell at any time by breaking your concentration. This spell effects everyone in its radius, friend or foe. You may choose whether the spell affects you.

effect.description: When you first cast your spell and at the end of each of your turns, enemies can make a spell power saving throw to avoid its effects. When you end the spell, enemies who fall must make a spell power save or take damage and be knocked Prone. On success, they take half damage.

name: Warlock

handbook.title: Intro
handbook.text: Bound to darkness. By ambition or necessity, a Warlock enters into a pact with an otherworldly force. This being grants them incredible magics, but at a cost; every pact has it's price. This price be anything from gathering information for your patron to performing tasks for them. Regardless, your pact and your patron will greatly color your adventuring career.

handbook.title: When Adventuring
handbook.text: Warlocks have access to a vast array of useful magics which can aid any adventuring party. In particular, Warlocks are masters of gathering information; spells like Eyes of Uriel and Summon Familiar allow you to easily scout the world around you. Like other casters, Warlocks have low health, and often stand back and watch as other party members throw themselves into harm's way.

handbook.title: When Socializing
handbook.text: Known for their Charisma, a warlock can easily become the face of an adventuring party. And when force of personality fails, magic can intervene. The powerful Convince and Mask of Shadows spells can be used to impersonate enemies or magically manipulate particularly troublesome individuals.

handbook.title: When in Combat
handbook.text: Warlock's shine in combat with one of the most aggressive spell lists in the realms. Eldritch blast is the heart of the Warlock's arsenal, allowing them to deal impressive damage to single targets. Beyond that, the Warlock has a number of crowd control spells which shape the battlefield. Beckon allows the Warlock to move their, and Mire makes terrain difficult to navigate.

handbook.title: Charisma Caster
handbook.text: Warlocks leverage their charisma when dealing with the patron and using their magic. At the start of your journey, you can declare that you are a Charisma Caster. From that point on, Charisma rather than Intelligence affects your maximum action points and informal magic.

expertise: As a Warlock, you are marked by a fiendish charisma. Take expertise in charisma checks made to persuade, trick, or obfuscate. Further, take expertise in any check made to discern the nature of dark magics or the motives of a villain.

Tier_1.name: Mind Whip
Tier_1.description: Raising your fingers to your temples, you channel your energy and slice an enemy with a psychic whip.

effect.description: If you roll a 6 on any of the dice for this attack, your target is Stunned.

Tier_1.name: Eldritch Blast
Tier_1.description: A screaming bolt of green energy leaps from your hand, decaying your enemy where it touches them.

effect.description: You can spend an additional action point on this spell to force your target to make a spell power saving thow. On failure, they are affected by Rot.

Tier_1.name: Curse
Tier_1.description: Muttering an oath, you place a curse upon a creature of your choice. Whenever you attack that creature, deal an additional 1d6 psychic damage. This damage increases to 1d8 then 1d10 in gameplay tiers 2 and 3.

effect.description: Pick a stat. The creature has disadvantage on checks and saves of that type until the spell ends. If the creature dies, you may immediately move the curse to another creature within range.

Tier_1.name: Hexblade
Tier_1.description: Dark fire flickers across a blade as you touch it. If you listen closely, you can hear faint screams.

effect.description: The weapon becomes Infused with necrotic damage.

Tier_1.name: Sap Life
Tier_1.description: Dark tendrils writhe from your outstretched hand and pierce your enemy. They pulse like veins as they sap your target's vitality and return it to you.
Tier_1.upcast: For each additional action point, deal an additional dice of damage.

effect.description: Any damage dealt by this spell is Leeched.

Tier_1.name: Tide of Shadow
Tier_1.description: Release a powerful, short-range blast of psychic energy. The blast deals damage to all enemies in a cone in front of you.

effect.description: Targets must make a spell power save or begin to Rot.
effect.save: The spell's victims may reattempt their saving throw at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_1.name: Telepathy
Tier_1.description: You are able to project your thoughts into someone's mind. Willing participants can let you to read their thoughts, allowing for two-way communication.

Tier_1.name: Read Mind
Tier_1.description: Use psychic energy to probe someone's mind and learn their secrets. If you choose to read only their surface level thoughts, you immediately succeed and they are unaware that the spell was cast. You can optionally choose to delve deeper. If you delve deeper, the creature must make a spell power save or have their mind read. On success, they know the spell was cast.

Tier_1.name: Summon Darkness
Tier_1.description: Fill an area with billowing darkness. The darkness is considered magical, and is not affected by darkvision.

effect.description: Anyone in the darkness is considered Blinded unless they have Blindsight, Truesight, or another equivalent ability.

Tier_1.name: Darksight
Tier_1.description: Your pupils expand to cover your eyes as you grant yourself the power to see in darkness.

effect.description: For the spell's duration, you gain the benefits of Darkvision.

Tier_1.name: Embed Eye
Tier_1.description: Embed a magical eye in a non-living material. The eye has 1 hit point, but is ethereal. While the eye is closed, it is invisible. For the spell's duration, you can concentrate to cause the eye to open and to see through it.
Tier_1.upcast: You can spend one additional action point to cause the eye to last for 1 week, or two to make it last for one month.

Tier_1.name: Summon Familiar
Tier_1.description: Summon a small animal such as a bat, dog, or rat to be your familiar. The familiar follows your instructions. If you have the spell Embed Eye, you may use it to add an eye to your familiar. If your familiar is de-summoned or killed, you may cast this spell again to bring it back. You may spend one action point to instantly teleport your familiar to yourself, but it drops whatever it is holding. Whenever you re-summon your familiar, you are able to change its form. Your familiar has a number of hit points equal to the sum of your inner fire and expertise.

Tier_1.name: Haunt
Tier_1.description: Impress your will upon someone you can see. They must make a spell power save or be Haunted. The next time they sleep, you know exactly where they are, can manipulate their dreams, and can force them to answer one question truthfully. They do not gain any benefits from sleep.

Tier_1.name: Become Ethereal
Tier_1.description: Your form flickers as you enter the plane of the ethereal. You may stay there for a number of minutes equal to your combined spell power and expertise or until you choose to regain your material form as a free action.

effect.description: While in this state, you are considered Ethereal.

Tier_1.name: Convince
Tier_1.description: Psychic barbs implant themselves into your targets mind, attempting to bend them to your will.

effect.description: They must make a Spell Power save or become Charmed. On success, they know that you attempted to cast a spell on them.
effect.save: The spell's victim may reattempt their save at the end of each of their turns or once every ten minutes when out of combat.

Tier_1.name: Echoes of the Past
Tier_1.description: Echoes and specters dance in your vision as you reach into the past. For the duration, you are able to see what happened within the spell's radius over the past day.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to look back within the past week.

Tier_1.name: Frenzy
Tier_1.description: Blood-red energy swirls around your target, filling them with frenetic energy.

effect.description: The targetted creature becomes Frenzied.

Tier_1.name: Mental Assault
Tier_1.description: Hideous and discordant voices fill your target's ears.

effect.description: At the start of each turn, the target must make a spell power save or be Distracted.

Tier_1.name: Shadow Ward
Tier_1.description: Create a shroud of inky darkness around yourself.

effect.description: Allies can see through, but enemies are considered to be in magical darkness and are Blinded.

Tier_1.name: Disguise
Tier_1.description: Magically alter your form so that you look like someone else. You must appear humaniod and be within one foot of your current height. Your disguise can include a new wardrobe. Magical alterations are ethereal and do not hold up to physical inspection.

Tier_1.name: Isolate
Tier_1.description: Swirling darkness dances around your target as you attempt to cut them off from their allies.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Isolated for the spell's duration.

Tier_1.name: Raise Thrall
Tier_1.description: Reach across the void and pull a maddened spirit from the darkness. A corpse within range disappears and is replaced with a summoned thrall. The thrall is mindless, obeying only you. It can neither speak nor reason, though if you give it simple instructions it will attempt to carry them out.

Tier_1.name: Shadowstep
Tier_1.description: Fade into the darkness and immediately re-appear within a shadow in the spell's range. Both the start and destination of this spell must be in partial darkness.

Tier_1.name: Beckon
Tier_1.description: As you mutter an eldritch incantation, a psycic attractor appears at a point of your choosing.
Tier_1.upcast: Spend an additional action point to cause this spell to affect all enemies within a 30ft radius.

effect.description: Your target must make a spell power save or be Lured toward the point.

Tier_1.name: Mire
Tier_1.description: 1d4 orbs of darkness hurtle from your focus towards unoccupied spaces of your choice. Upon hitting, they each create an area of writhing darkness.

effect.description: Any enemy that passes through or begins their turn within the mire is Hindered. They must also make a spell power save or be Staggered.

Tier_1.name: Mute
Tier_1.description: Gripping your focus, you attempt to magically silence someone.
Tier_1.upcast: You may spend an additional action point to grant the spell a radius of 30ft and target everyone within.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be considered Mute until the spell ends.

Tier_1.name: Surrogate
Tier_1.description: As an enemy attack hurtles towards you, attempt to compel someone block it.

effect.description: Force the nearest hostile creature in range to make a spell power save. On failure, they dive in front of you to save you from an attack.

Tier_2.name: Hurl Through Hell
Tier_2.description: A gaping pit envelops your enemy and sends them careening through the nine layers of the abyss.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or spend 1d4-1 (minimum 1) turns falling through the hells. On success, they take half damage and are not sucked into the portal. When they return from the abyss, they reappear and slam to the earth. They must make spell power save or be Burning and Prone.

Tier_2.name: Murder of Crows
Tier_2.description: With a sound like a rush of wind, a murder of crows streaks past you and to a location of your choice, dealing damage as it goes. For the spell's duration, any enemy who begins their turn within the swarm or who passes through it takes damage. As an offhand action on your turn, you may command the murder of crows to move up to 30 feet. Swarm damage is not affected by focus modifiers. A creature may be harmed at most one time by a swarm of crows per round of combat.

Tier_2.name: Cthulian Tentacles
Tier_2.description: At your command, shadows converge into hideous tentacles and burst from the ground. Together, they converge on two of your foes.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an action point to create two additional tentacles, attacking two additional creatures in range.

effect.description: Your target must make a spell power save or be Grappled grappled entities take damage at the start of each turn.

Tier_2.name: Wilting Touch
Tier_2.description: Black veins creep down your arms as you grip an enemy and channel powerful necrotic energy into them.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be affected by Rot.
effect.save: The spell's victim may reattempt their save at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_2.name: Death Bolt
Tier_2.description: You loose a screaming bolt of green necrotic energy, harming all enemies in a line before you.

Tier_2.name: Tethered Minds
Tier_2.description: Tether the minds of up to eight individuals. For the spell's duration, they are able to speak telepathically regardless of distance. The effects of the spell end if a creature enters another realm.
Tier_2.upcast: You may spend an additional action point on this spell to make it last 6 hours, or two more to make it last 24 hours.

Tier_2.name: Open Rift
Tier_2.description: Tear a rift in the fabric of reality. Anyone who jumps through is transported to a location of your choosing within 100 miles. If you have visited the location, you are able to open the rift with no trouble. If not, roll an intelligence check with the Grand Poohbah to determine where the rift lets out. Whenever this spell is cast, roll 1d10. On a 1, something comes out of the rift.

Tier_2.name: Eyes of Uriel
Tier_2.description: As you hold both hands aloft, 1d4+1 eyes suddenly open in the air behind you. Each is the size of a balled fist, and they float in a halo about you. The eyes move slowly, and travel at about the walking speed of a normal person, fifteen feet per turn. If you concentrate, you can see through the eyes. When the eyes close, they become Ethereal and cannot be seen.

effect.description: If an eye is within fifteen feet of an attack, you may use your reaction to cause the eye to sacrifice itself and become the attack's target instead.

Tier_2.name: Crown of Chaos
Tier_2.description: A hideous crown appears on your head, shining with a ghastly green light.

effect.description: All enemies in the spell's radius are Weakened.

Tier_2.name: Shared Fate
Tier_2.description: Tether two creatures together.

effect.description: If one dies, the other must make a spell power save. On failure, they take an amount of damage equal to the killing blow. On success, they take half as much damage. The creatures must be within one hundred feet of each other.

Tier_2.name: Radiant Darkness
Tier_2.description: A bead of greenish light explodes at a point of your choosing and rapidly exapnds, filling a sphere with blinding light.

effect.description: Anyone who begins a turn within the sphere or who moves through it takes damage. They must also make a spell power save or be Blinded. Creatures can avoid this save by moving at half speed.
effect.save: Blinded creatures may reattempt their save at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_2.name: Rebuke Spell
Tier_2.description: When an enemy successfully casts a spell, force them to make a spell power save. On failure, they also suffer the effects of their spell.

Tier_2.name: Armor of Lucien
Tier_2.description: For a moment, radiant armor appears about you before fading from vision. For the spell's duration, your gain an amount of temporary health equal to your inner fire times five. When the temporary health is gone or the spell's duration elapses, the spell ends. While the spell is active, anyone who strikes you takes damage.

Tier_2.name: Dark Citidel
Tier_2.description: Your patron grants you a dwelling in their realm in the form of a Dark Citadel. When you cast this spell, a door opens which only you can see. You and your allies may go through it and gain access to your Citadel. The first time you visit, a terrible fiend has taken up residence, and you must drive it out. Work with your Grand Poohbah to design your Citadel, giving it features needed by your party and relevant to your bond with your patron.

Tier_2.name: Lift
Tier_2.description: Concentrate on up to three targets to cause them to lift into the air.

effect.description: Your targets must make a spell power save to avoid being Hoisted. Hoisted creatures may not be raised more than thirty feet. Enemies that are released from this spell take Falling Damage.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns.

Tier_2.name: Commune
Tier_2.description: Attempt to commune with your patron. Roll 1d20 and add your expertise. On a 19 or above, you make contact. During this contact, you may ask one question, which your patron may choose to answer or not. Commune can be attempted once per day.

Tier_3.name: Sorris' Decay
Tier_3.description: Your outstretched hand beckons forth the essence of the abyss, a roiling tide of inky darkness. Like a dragon's breath, decay bursts forward, washing over everyone in a cone before you.

effect.description: Targets must make a spell power save or take full damage and begin to Rot. On success, they take half damage.

Tier_3.name: Torugar the Many Tongued Demon
Tier_3.description: A black wind howls as you summon a pit housing Torugar, an ancient demon from the Abyss. Each turn, 1d6 pitch-black tongues (max 6) writhe forth from the pit and attempt to grapple an individual within the spell's radius. Torugar does not distinguish friend from foe. If a tongue takes 50 damage on a single turn, it releases its grapple and returns to the pit. Each turn an enemy is grappled by a tongue, it takes damage and is pulled 2d4 spaces towards the pit. Anyone who enters the pit is transported to Torugar's Realm, deep within the sixth layer of the Abyss. The tongues' damage is not modified by your casting focus.

effect.description: Affected creatures must make a spell power save or be grappled.
effect.save: The spell's victims may repeat their save against being grappled as an action on their turn.

Tier_3.name: Psychic Spear
Tier_3.description: Amid the chaos of battle, your willpower coalesces into a shimmering spear of pure psychic energy. With a focused gesture, you hurl it toward your chosen adversary. The spear streaks through the air. Upon impact, it tears into the target's psyche with an explosive force, inflicting profound mental anguish. The victim's thoughts unravel, their senses distort, and their very consciousness trembles under the psychic onslaught.

Tier_3.name: Reclaim Soul
Tier_3.description: Prepare the body of someone who has died within the past week. Scrawl runes on their flesh to mark them as a conduit to the realm beyond. Find the location of their soul using a tuning fork. Once you've found it, place a soul gem on their chest, and reach beyond the divide. Roll 1d20. If the result is 11 or higher, reclaim the target's soul and return them to life. On failure, something else returns and takes up residence in the body.
Tier_3.upcast: If someone who loved the deceased dearly helps you, they may spend one action point to to grant you advantage on your check.

Tier_3.name: Dominate
Tier_3.description: As you focus your intent upon a hostile creature, dark tendrils close in about them, reaching forth into their mind.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or become Controlled by you.

Tier_3.name: Astral Prison
Tier_3.description: Subdue a creature and restrain them with magic. Using a void prism, create a pocket dimension which overlaps the material realm. Spend an hour crafting oblivion shackles and bind them to the creature. As you bind them to the creature, speak an omen which will reasonably occur. The creature is bound within the spell's radius until it is dispelled or the omen occurs. No action taken by the bound creature may free them.
Tier_3.upcast: By spending three more action points and using a void catalyst (10,000 gold) you can reduce the casting time of this spell to 3 minutes and cast it on an unrestrained creature.

name: Gunslinger

handbook.title: Intro
handbook.text: A tumbleweed rolls across the street as the gunslinger steps into the noonday sun, her hand hovering over the handgun at her hip. High atop a rise, the marksman sites down the scope of his long-rifle, centering his crosshairs on the ogre's head. A bloody grin on his face, the bounty hunter mounts a breaching charge to the wall as his party looks on nervously. Through luck, valor, or perhaps trickery, they have mastered the use of one of the most complicated weapons in the world. As such, gunslinger's have a close bond with their weapon, which is usually their primary means of income. Gunslingers are a damage-first class, and they can specialize in mid- or long-range combat.

handbook.title: When Adventuring
handbook.text: Gunslingers are especially perceptive, making good lookouts and scouts. They specialize in the use of gadgets and machines, and most are intelligent enough to be a serviceable tinker. They come into their own in combat, however, serving as a heavy hitter for an adventuring party.

handbook.title: When Socializing
handbook.text: Whether silent and calculating or brash and fun-loving, Gunslingers command the respect of those around them. Across most of the realms, firearms are things of legend; so when a gun-toting stranger enters the scene, villagers take notice.

handbook.title: When in Combat
handbook.text: Gunslingers can specialize in either long or short-ranged combat. Long ranged gunslingers provide high single target damage and support for their party by setting up and carefully picking off foes one by one. Mid-ranged gunslingers wield scatterguns or handguns and rush into the fray in a hail of bullets.

expertise: As a gunslinger, you are incredibly perceptive. Add your expertise whenever you make a perception or passive perception check.

abilities.name: Strike From The Shadows
abilities.description: Barely daring to breathe, you line up a shot on your unsuspecting enemy.

effect.description: Add 1d6 damage to attacks made from hiding.

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.description: Carefully line up your next shot.

effect.description: When you attack, double your weapon's effective range and increase it's damage.

abilities.name: Reduced Critical
abilities.description: You now gain a hero token when you roll a 19 or 20.

abilities.name: Chain Attack
abilities.description: Before your foe's body has even hit the ground, you line up your next shot.

effect.description: Whenever you slay an enemy, you are Spurred to Action.

abilities.name: Set Up
abilities.description: Spend an action to set up with your long-gun.

effect.description: Until you break down, roll the damage dice for your firearm at advantage. Breaking down requires one action and half of your movement unless you abandon your rifle.

abilities.name: Harrying Shots
abilities.description: Your attacks knock ranged enemies off guard.

effect.description: Whenever your attacks hit, your target is considered Harried.

abilities.name: Blinding Shot
abilities.description: Fire a round which glances your opponent's head.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Blinded.

abilities.name: Bleeding Critical
abilities.description: Your critical hits are particularly savage.

effect.description: When you use a hero token to do extra damage, you may spend 1AP to convert half of the damage to Bleeding. This can be stacked with other critical hit enhancements.

abilities.name: Piercing Shot
abilities.description: You find exactly the right angle to fire a shot which pierces your enemies.

effect.description: The shot passes through all enemies in a line before you, dealing damage to each. A piercing shot can pass through up to 5ft of cover.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.description: Taking your firearm in hand, you rush towards your enemy and loose a battle cry as you fire on them.

effect.description: You can make a disadvantaged attack while dashing.

abilities.name: Fan the Hammer
abilities.description: Rapidly make attacks against all enemies in a cone before you.

effect.description: You must be wielding a handgun to utilize this ability.

abilities.name: Draw!
abilities.description: You are constantly ready to spring into action.

effect.description: Whenever you roll initiative for combat, add your expertise to the result.

abilities.name: Last Stand
abilities.description: Using nothing but determination, you keep yourself conscious even as you bleed out.

effect.description: While you are on death's door, you may make one attack per turn immediately before your death coin flip. If you slay your target, immediately raise to 1 health.

abilities.name: Shoot from the Hip
abilities.description: As a reaction, hastily take a shot at an enemy who is threatening you.

effect.description: Your enemy must make a spell power save or be Halted and have their attack fail to land.

abilities.name: First Strike
abilities.description: You are able to move quickly and strike your foes while they are defenseless. If you attack an enemy that has not yet moved in combat, deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Grit
abilities.description: Whenever you are met with an obstacle, you may attempt to overcome it by the most over the top route possible. For example, swinging on a vine to cross a gap or sliding down a ladder rather than climbing wrung by wrung.

effect.description: When you do this, you may tell your Poohbah and add your expertise to the check. On failure, Something Bad Happens.

abilities.name: Called Shot
abilities.description: Carefully target a specific part of your enemy in an attempt to hinder them.

effect.description: Your target must make a spell power save or be affected by a condition of your choice from the following list:
options: You aim for something in you're target's grasp, and Disarm them.
You aim for a flying creature's wing, and cause them to fall 50ft.
You aim at your target's head, and the suppressing fire Distracts them.
You aim for your target's center of mass, and they are knocked back 15ft.
You aim for your target's legs, and they are Hindered.

abilities.name: Called Critical
abilities.description: Whenever you spend a hero token to do extra damage, you may choose to immediately apply one of the effects from your Called Shot to your enemy.

effect.description: If the attack was already a Called Shot, apply two.

abilities.name: Tracer
abilities.description: An arc of light cuts across the battlefield as you fire a tracer at your target.

effect.description: They are considered Exposed, and they must make a spell power save or begin Burning.

abilities.name: Flash Grenade
abilities.description: Magically enchant an item that you are holding, turning it into your a flash grenade which will explode on impact or in six seconds time.

effect.description: Enemies within the blasts radius must make a spell power save or be Blinded.

abilities.name: Breaching Charge
abilities.description: Spend 10 minutes to create a breaching charge which takes one minute to deploy. The charge is not a weapon, but can instead blast through up to five feet of a solid substance. The magic used to make breaching charges is shortlived, and they break down an hour after they are created.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Single out a creature and challenge them to a duel which they cannot refuse.

effect.description: Until you break concentration, your speed is halved but you may your attacks deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Covering Fire
abilities.description: As the final action on your turn, lay down covering fire across a 15x60ft line before you.

effect.description: Until the start of your next turn, anyone who walks through it is Hindered and takes damage.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.description: As an enemy attacks you, leap out of the way.

effect.description: You are considered to be Dodging, and may move 5ft in any direction. If you have the 'Shoot From the Hip' ability, you may roll 5ft any time you use it at no additional cost.

abilities.name: Adrenaline
abilities.description: Spend one of your luck points to amp yourself up as you prepare to leap into danger.

effect.description: For the next 60 seconds, you are affected by the Hastened condition. You do not take exhaustion as a result.
